ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] careDuration with data type Time Interval
Contains the date and time for the duration of the Anesthesia event during the surgery.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the anesthesia administration event.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The value specifying the state of this patient surgical encounter (based on the RIM Act class state machine), for example, active, aborted, completed

Contains exactly one [1..1] postNoteDate with data type Point In Time
Date and Time of the post note.

Uniquely identifies the anesthesia administration event.

The value specifying the state of this patient surgical encounter (based on the RIM Act class state machine), for example, active, aborted, completed

Contains exactly one [1..1] postNoteDate with data type Point In Time
Date and Time of the post note.
